properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V HAWK EXPLORER TOWING 5.4 MILE LONG CABLES:
   A. 29 JUN ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      06-09.62N 050-12.23W AND 03-55.42N 047-39.58W.
   B. 30 JUN THRU 01 JUL ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN BETWEEN
      06-13.73N 050-08.73W AND 03-59.47N 047-36.02W.
   C. 02 JUL ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      06-51.82N 049-31.22W AND 05-20.73N 050-53.72W.
   D. 03 JUL ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      05-49.08N 049-03.45W AND 04-41.55N 050-02.38W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 04 JUL.
